name: Rising Tides (olsenbt)
description:
Rising Tides is a point and click adventure game inspired by "Don't Escape" by Scriptwelder. Rising Tides takes place in a near distant future where climate change has lead to frequent natural disasters. As a result, many face severe poverty and lack of support from the government. You play as someone living in a coastal area given advanced notice of an upcoming storm. Collect items and prepare for the upcoming storm.

Will you survive the Rising Tides?

Note: This project is still in development. Current gameplay shows the main mechanics of the game.

To Do:

- Add more intractable objects 

- Implement a settings menu

- Finish the end game mechanics (currently shows the winning text)
